spec_data.Name: emacs-common-tuareg
spec_data.Description:
Tuareg is an OCaml mode for GNU Emacs and XEmacs.  It handles
automatic indentation of Objective Caml and Caml Light code.  Key
parts of the code are highlighted using Font-Lock.  Support to run an
interactive Caml toplevel and debbuger is provided.

This package contains the common files.  Install emacs-tuareg to get
the complete package.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:09:45 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Emacs and XEmacs mode for editing ocaml
